CustomField.description: The attempt number for the transaction on the related invoice line. 0 means first attempt for payment (generally the first automated attempt), 1 means first re-attempt, 2 means 2nd re-attempt, etc
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The attempt number for the transaction on the related invoice line. 0 means first attempt for payment (generally the first automated attempt), 1 means first re-attempt, 2 means 2nd re-attempt, etc
CustomField.label: Transaction Attempt Number
